snippet: The wife of Donald Suxho, the starting setter for the United States men’s volleyball team, can finally watch him at the Olympics after initially being denied a visa into London.
abstract: United States men's volleyball team defeats Tunisia in three-set match; Ukrainian-born wife of Donald Suxho, US team's starting setter, can finally watch him at the London Games after initially being denied a visa.
lead_paragraph: The wife of Donald Suxho, the starting setter for the United States men’s volleyball team, can finally watch him at the Olympics after initially being denied a visa into London.

headline.seo: U.S. Volleyball Team’s Donald Suxho Has Wins on Court and Off
headline.main: For U.S. Volleyball Leader, Victories on Court and Off
headline.print_headline: For U.S. Team’s Leader, Victories on Court and Off
